name: CENTRAL STATES FUNDS
description: Central States Funds are multi-employer Taft-Hartley benefits funds.
sampleDescriptions: Multiemployer pension plan funding reform legislation, including government loan legislation, and regulations changing the multiemployer plan funding rules and multiemployer plan withdrawal liability
